name: Pix adventure
description:
You play as a rectangle with legs. You need to get to the end of the level, but there will be obstacles along the way.

Artists :

Inkedsplat - Pre-Apocalypse Goods

Possums At Twilight - Sepia Expedition

Abstraction - Dirty Cartridges

Huskotron - The Good Old Days

madbrain - Party Cellar

CP-r - Nostalgia

Hanover is Taken - DeJaVu

Sakunera - Flover

Filbar - SynthКse SimulВe

(if your music is not in the game but is in credits, this means that I did not have time to add all the music to the game. It will be added in subsequent updates to the game)
